name: Neon Space ULTRA
description: The game takes place in the vast outer space, which became a field of fierce battles. Your goal is to free the galaxy from the cruel dictatorship of terrifying invaders, Slans.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 120 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio

reviews.review_text: It's a solid space shooter for those looking for the old arcade experience.  I've encountered no bugs or trouble with the controls so far.
